column4: I lost my downloads in firefox.  They always came to the desktop now the download window doesn't come up and I can't find the file
or, you can just open a terminal and do: find | grep <filename>
thanks, not in /Desktop though.  THanks fo the grep syntax
it'll show you in the dialog box where files are being downloaded
thanks for the tip.  so, it's not downloading recently for some reason
seacat 'open with' works but not save to disk
when I 'open with' the file goes to ~tmp and I can view it fine and it shows up in the downloads.  But, if I 'save to disk' nothing happens
how did it get root ownership/
I don't know how that happened.  But, changing the ownership did work just now
